name: cnpm
description: dependency manager with or without manifests

scripts.zlib: cd cpp_modules/zlib && make clean && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=dist . && make install
scripts.ssl: cd cpp_modules/openssl && ./config shared --prefix=`pwd`/openssl --openssldir=`pwd`/openssl/openssl && make && make install
scripts.urlcpp: cd cpp_modules/urlcpp && mkdir -p test && cnpm install && pwd && make -f Makefile all
scripts.libgit2: mkdir -p build && cd build && ccmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=`pwd`/../dist -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DOPENSSL_CRYPTO_LIBRARY=`pwd`/../../openssl/openssl/lib64/libcrypto.so -DOPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR=`pwd`/../../openssl/openssl/include  -DOPENSSL_SSL_LIBRARY=`pwd`/../../openssl/openssl/lib64/libssl.so  .. && cmake --build . && make install

author: rimmartin
